alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Walton, Holmes and northwestern Washington Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bonifay to 12 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Union, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Center Ridge, Smith Crossroads, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill, Izagora, New Hope, Piney Grove, Argyle and Red Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
